        Parameters:

      • bottomMargin

        public T bottomMargin(int bottomMargin)
        Updates the parameter for margin at the bottom. This margin splits the bottom of the image from the bottom of the graph area. The margin size must be a non-negative integer.
        Parameters:
        bottomMargin - margin at bottom of image in pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • topMargin

        public T topMargin(int topMargin)
        Updates the parameter for margin at the top. This margin splits the top of the image from the top of the label/axis area. The margin size must be a non-negative integer.
        Parameters:
        topMargin - margin at top of image in pixels
        Returns:
        this

        Parameters:
        leftMargin - margin at top of image in pixels
        Returns:

      • rightMargin

        public T rightMargin(int rightMargin)

        Parameters:
        rightMargin - margin at right of image in pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • allMargins

        public T allMargins(int marginSize)
        Updates the parameter for all margins (top, bottom, left, right). All margins are set to the same size. This margin region splits the edge of the image from the edge of the label/axis area. The margin size must be a non-negative integer.
        Parameters:
        marginSize - margin on all sides of image in pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • bottomAreaMargin

        public T bottomAreaMargin(int bottomAreaMargin)
        Updates the parameter for margin at the bottom of the graph area. This margin splits the bottom of the graph area (where the line is drawn) from the bottom of the label/axis area. The margin size must be a non-negative integer.
        Parameters:
        bottomAreaMargin - margin at bottom of the graph area in pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • topAreaMargin

        public T topAreaMargin(int topAreaMargin)

        Parameters:
        topAreaMargin - margin at top of the graph area in pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • allAreaMargins

        public T allAreaMargins(int areaMarginSize)
        Updates the parameter for all margins (top, bottom, left, right) of the graph area. All margins are set to the same size. This margin splits the all edges of the graph area (where the line is drawn) from all edges of the label/axis area. The margin size must be a non-negative integer.
        Parameters:
        areaMarginSize - margin on all sides of graph area in pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • xLabelMargin

        public T xLabelMargin(int xLabelMargin)
        Updates the parameter for the margin for the labels on the x-axis. This margin splits the area for the x-axis labels from the graph area. The margin size must be a non-negative integer.
        Parameters:
        xLabelMargin - margin for the x-axis labels in pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • yLabelMargin

        public T yLabelMargin(int yLabelMargin)
        Updates the parameter for the margin for the labels on the y-axis. This margin splits the area for the y-axis labels from the graph area. The margin size must be a non-negative integer.
        Parameters:
        yLabelMargin - margin for the y-axis labels in pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • allLabelMargins

        public T allLabelMargins(int labelMarginSize)
        Updates the parameter for the margins for the labels on both axes. This margin splits the area for the labels on both axes from the graph area. The margin size must be a non-negative integer.
        Parameters:
        labelMarginSize - margin for the x-axis and y-axis labels in pixels
        Returns:
        this
